item.title: German Cardiac Arrest Registry
item.description:
2022
G-CAR is the first national (German) registry including a long-term follow-up for adult OHCA patients with presumed underlying cardiovascular cause and long-term follow-up development and design of website, currently updating and maintaining website and server for Leipzig Heart Science gGmbH.
